mapper.insert: insert into t_financial_project (proId, proName, proMoney, proStartTime, proEndTime) values (#{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{proEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select proId, proName, proMoney, proStartTime, proEndTime from t_financial_project
